sentences.en: A newer anti-HIV drug called pyridinone caused HIV to mutate into a form which could not reproduce or infect new cells.
sentences.cn: 一种叫作吡啶酮的新型抗艾滋病药物能促使艾滋病毒变异，使其不能繁殖，也不会再感染新的细胞。

sentences.en: Bacteria reproduce by dividing and making copies of themselves.
sentences.cn: 细菌通过分裂和自我复制来繁殖。

sentences.en: Cells can reproduce but only molecules can replicate.
sentences.cn: 细胞可以再生，但是只有分子可以复制。

sentences.en: He is not attempting necessarily to reproduce the cadence of speech.
sentences.cn: 他不想刻意重复那种讲话的语调。

sentences.en: I shall not try to reproduce the policemen's English.
sentences.cn: 我不会试图去模仿那个警察讲的英语。

sentences.en: If we can reproduce the form we have shown in the last couple of months we will be successful.
sentences.cn: 如果我们能再采用前两个月的形式，我们就会成功。

sentences.en: It seems to me a fatal illusion to expect one's children simply to reproduce one's own views.
sentences.cn: 在我看来，期望孩子一味照搬自己的观点是一种后果极其严重的错误观念。

sentences.en: Klimt’s artwork is reproduced in this exquisite book.
sentences.cn: 这本精美的书里翻印了克里木特的艺术作品。
许多真菌可以无性繁殖。

sentences.en: One of the new models has the facility to reproduce speech as well as text.
sentences.cn: 新型号中有一款具备复读和文本复制的功能。

sentences.en: The effect has proved hard to reproduce.
sentences.cn: 这种效果经证实很难再造。

sentences.en: The enclosed photograph is unfortunately not good enough to reproduce.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是，附寄的照片不够清晰，无法复制。

sentences.en: The machine can reproduce a key in two minutes.
sentences.cn: 这机器能在两分钟内复制一把钥匙.

sentences.en: The turtles return to the coast to reproduce.
We are grateful to you for permission to reproduce this article.
sentences.cn: 非常感谢您允许我们复印这篇文章。

sentences.en: We obtained special permission to reproduce the book in our magazine.
sentences.cn: 本刊得到特别许可翻印这本书.

sentences.en: With a good set of speakers, you can reproduce the orchestra’s sound in your own home.
sentences.cn: 有一套好的扬声器，就可以在家里重现管弦乐队的音响效果。

words.tran_cn: 可再生的；可繁殖的；可复写的
扬声器；复制程序；再生器
复制；再生；生殖；使…在脑海中重现

trans.tran_en: to make a photograph or printed copy of something
if an animal or plant reproduces, or reproduces itself, it produces young plants or animals
to make a photograph or printed copy of something

trans.tran_cn: 复制，重现，再版，生殖，繁殖

trans.tran_en: if an animal or plant reproduces, or reproduces itself, it produces young plants or animals
